This page tries to list all the symbols that are available from the [[cpp/standard library|standard library]] ([[cpp/chrono|date and time library]]) in the namespace {{c|std::chrono}}. The symbols are written as follows:
* Function names with {{tt|()}}.
* Templates with {{tt|&lt;&gt;}}.
